Question: During ****'s youth, his family made several European journeys in which he and Nannerl performed as child prodigies.
Hints: This person no longer borrowed large sums from Puchberg, and made a start on paying off his debts.
The resulting quarrel came to a head in May: this person attempted to resign and was refused.
A number of composers have paid homage to this person by writing sets of variations on his themes.
